content.html: [...] WPEngineer explains how to build a Wordpress 2.8 widget, using object-oriented php; Joseph Scott how to manage the new features of the XML-RPC and AtomPub with Baker; Weblog Tools Collection collected a list of articles dealing with Wordpress 2.8; Justin Tadlock explains the management and customization of taxonomies in the new version; Will Norris wrote an article about new features in authentication. [...]
